CustomField.formula:
If(OR( INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Entertainment"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Audio"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Large Appliances"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Cleaning"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Accessories"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Connected Devices"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Small Appliances"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Photos & Video"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Connected Devices"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Mobility"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Tools"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Gardening"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Beauty And Spa")), "Other Diversification",
IF (OR(INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "MacBook"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Tablet"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Earphones"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "iMac"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Computer & Co"), INCLUDES( Type_of_product__c , "Apple Watch")) , "Core Electronics", "Smartphones"))
